current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Indian Tribal Judgment  Funds Use or Distribution Act to extend a certain income tax
			 exemption to the Grand Portage Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Grand Portage Band Per Capita Adjustment Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Grand Portage Band Per Capita Adjustment Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

quote.#text:
pursuant to the agreements of such Band to voluntarily restrict tribal rights to hunt and fish in
			 territory cede

or the Grand Portage Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians, or both, pursuant to the agreements of
			 each band to voluntarily restrict tribal rights to hunt and fish in
			 territory ceded

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 7(4) of the Indian Tribal Judgment  Funds Use or Distribution Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Indian Tribal Judgment Funds Use or Distribution Act/s:7/p:4

header.#text: Equal treatment of certain per capita income for purposes of Federal assistance

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S2249 IS: Grand Portage Band Per Capita Adjustment Act
